Logging¶

HasLog¶

class HasLog¶

Bases: sims4communitylib.mod_support.has_mod_identity.HasModIdentity

Base class for classes with a log.

property log¶

The Log for this class.

property log_identifier¶

An identifier for the Log of this class.

property mod_identity¶

The Identity of the mod that owns this class.

CommonLogUtils¶

class CommonLogUtils¶

Bases: object

Utilities for getting paths used for logging.

static get_exceptions_file_path(mod_name: str) → str¶

Retrieve the file path to the Exceptions file used for logging error messages.

Parameters

mod_name – The name of the mod requesting the file path.

Returns

An str file path to the Exceptions file.

static get_message_file_path(mod_name: str) → str¶

Retrieve the file path to the Messages file used for logging info/debug messages.

Parameters

mod_name – The name of the mod requesting the file path.

Returns

An str file path to the Messages file.

static get_sims_documents_location_path() → str¶

Retrieves the folder path of the folder ‘DocumentsElectronic ArtsThe Sims 4’

Returns

The file path to ‘DocumentsElectronic ArtsThe Sims 4’ folder.

CommonLog¶

class CommonLog(mod_name: str, log_name: str)¶

Bases: object

A logging class used to log messages.

debug(message: str)¶

Log a message with message type DEBUG.

Parameters

message – The message to log.

disable()¶

Disable this log from logging

enable()¶

Enable this log for logging.

property enabled¶

Determine if the log is enabled or not.

Returns

True if the log is enabled.

error(message: str, message_type: str = CommonMessageType.ERROR, exception: Exception = None, throw: bool = True)¶

Log an error message with the specified message type

Parameters

  • message – The message to log.

  • message_type – The message type of the error message.

  • exception – The exception that occurred.

  • throw – If set to True, the exception will be rethrown.

format(*args, message_type: str = CommonMessageType.DEBUG, **kwargs)¶

Log a non-descriptive message containing pformatted arguments and keyword arguments with the specified message type.

Parameters

message_type – The MessageType of the logged message.

format_error(*args, exception: Exception = None, throw: bool = True, **kwargs)¶

Log a non-descriptive error message containing pformatted arguments and keyword arguments.

Parameters

  • exception – The exception that occurred.

  • throw – If set to True, the exception will be rethrown.

format_error_with_message(message: str, *args, exception: Exception = None, throw: bool = True, **kwargs)¶

Log an error message containing pformatted arguments and keyword arguments.

Parameters

  • message – The message to log.

  • exception – The exception that occurred.

  • throw – If set to True, the exception will be rethrown.

format_info(*args, **kwargs)¶

Log a non-descriptive message containing pformatted arguments and keyword arguments with message type INFO.

format_info_with_message(message: str, *args, **kwargs)¶

Log a message containing pformatted arguments and keyword arguments with message type INFO.

Parameters

message – The message to log.

format_with_message(message: str, *args, message_type: str = CommonMessageType.DEBUG, **kwargs)¶

Log a message containing pformatted arguments and keyword arguments with the specified message type.

Parameters

  • message – The message to log.

  • message_type – The type of message being logged.

info(message: str)¶

Log a message with message type INFO.

Parameters

message – The message to log.

log_stack()¶

Log the current stack trace and the calling frames

property name¶

The identifier of this log.

Returns

A string identifier.

CommonLogRegistry¶

class CommonLogRegistry¶

Bases: sims4communitylib.services.common_service.CommonService

A registry for log handlers. To register your own logs, please use CommonLogRegistry.get() to create a CommonLogRegistry.

disable_all_logs() → bool¶

Disable all logs from logging

Returns

True if successful

disable_logs(log_name: str) → bool¶

Disable all logs with the specified name from logging.

Parameters

log_name – The name of the logs to disable.

Returns

True if successful

enable_logs(log_name: str) → bool¶

Enables all logs with the specified name to begin logging.

Parameters

log_name – The name of the logs to enable.

Returns

True if successful

get_registered_log_names() → List[str]¶

Retrieve the names of all registered logs.

Returns

A collection of type str

log_exists(log_name: str) → bool¶

Determine if logs exist with the specified name.

Parameters

log_name – The name of the logs

Returns

True if a handler exists with the specified name.

register_log(mod_name: str, log_name: str) → sims4communitylib.utils.common_log_registry.CommonLog¶

Create and register a log with the specified name.

Parameters

  • mod_name – The name of the mod the log is registered for.

  • log_name – The name of the log.

Returns

An object of type CommonLog
